comments:
Opened for Kathy Endres

This occurs in IBM product on top of WTP 1.5
STEPS:
1. select File->New->Project->Dynamic Web Project
2. specified Project Name=MyWebProjT51,
                    Target runtime=IBM Proprietary WAS server instance
                    Add project to EAR:  MyEART51
3. selected Finish
4. selected Properties from MyWebProjT51's context menu
5. selected Project Facets
6. selected the Add/Remove Project Facets... button

RESULT:
the following RuntimeException was thrown to the .log file and consolelog window and 
no page appears to add/remove project facets or to show/hide the runtimes:
NOTE: the same result occurred when I tried to do the same for MyEART51, but
I verified none of these errors occur if I follow the same steps but target WAS v6.0.

=================================================================

From Kathy:

Actually, I think I noticed that this runtime exception tends to occur when the 
base WebSphere Web facet and the extended WebSphere web facet are both enabled.  This is a bad error in that it prevents us from being able to add/remove any facets (as the dialog never appears for facet selection).
This is blocking for the IBM product.

This looks like a dupe of something that has already been fixed. The problem is in how these facets are specified. Multiple applicable facet action definitions are being found. The current code will log a detailed error message and continue with the first action definition that it finds.

Kosta, can you please provide which defect this is a duplicate of or what build this is fixed for?

Thanks.

I suppose. :)

The tag for the fix is v200602131923. I checked the map files and it's in the latest declared i-build. 

http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/committers/drops/I-I200602161514-200602161514/

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 125075 ***
